channel.title: Advertising - need a simple layout
channel.description:
does anyone have a simple layout (using same program i use for highscores) im goign to be advertising for my fathers bessinus to make some extra cash with the eco crap and only working a few hours a week i need it for bills and to keep my vps up
just somethting simple abd bussinessy he does credit card torminals and also works with a cell phone company that is like the controler of it all , idk excatly lol
ill send you a link to the website onces i get it up and anyone who can redirect me thanks, i havnt searched yet for one just thought id ask here first i need to get to work.
